articles.title: Great Britain’s QUAD Announces The Launch Of Its Ultimate Platina Integrated Amplifier
articles.description: The new QUAD Platina Integrated amplifier represents the pinnacle of QUAD design and technology and blends it with the impeccable pedigree of British audio design.
articles.content: It’s been five years in the making and now QUAD, the classic British hi-fi brand, says it is finally ready to launch its most accomplished range of audio electronics yet. The new Platina Series is described as “hi-fi’s new gold standard,” and the Pla... [7159 chars]

articles.title: New York approves power line for Micron’s $100 billion semiconductor plant
articles.description: (Reuters) -A new underground transmission line was approved by the New York State Public Service Commission linking an existing Clay substation with Micron Technology's proposed semiconductor megafab facility in Onondaga County, Governor Kathy Hochul announced on Thursday.
articles.content: (Reuters) -A new underground transmission line was approved by the New York State Public Service Commission linking an existing Clay substation with Micron Technology's proposed semiconductor megafab facility in Onondaga County, Governor Kathy Hochul... [1042 chars]

articles.title: Best Theratronics will remain in Kanata, owner says
articles.description: The workforce at the medical technology company has shrunk to 60 workers, but owner Krishnan Suthanthiran insists it remains viable.
articles.content:
Article content
A Kanata plant that manufactures medical equipment will stay in business, but will not produce equipment that requires a nuclear licence, the company’s owner said Thursday.
